titleStmt.title: Doctor Do'goods directions, to cure many diseases both in body and minde, lately written and set forth for the good of infected persons. To the tune of The golden age.
titleStmt.author: I. D.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "If any are infected, giue audience a while ..."
Probably by the same author as STC 6171. Cf. STC.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
